names.Name: Harsh cleaning chemicals
Delicious warm popcorn smell shifts gradually to burnt
Faint whiff of a dirty diaper
Illicit thrill of perfume
Scent of burning leaves from a different plaza
Rank smell from a dying, diseased horse
Muffled punk rock from behind closed metal store gate
Pop of gunfire from a neighboring plaza
Buzzing of innumerable invisible flies and bees
Muzak interrupted by voice counting down from 3,243,023
Mother yelling at her kid from an inaccessible upper balcony
Screeching and animal hollering from behind boarded over store
Bright orange puddle of vomit, coupon to random store floating on top
Large elongated bubbles float through the plaza, blown by a giant child in a nearby plaza
Faction graffiti, i.e., a mannequin never forgets!, hearts can be broken!
Moonlight spills down from a high window
Skeleton next to an abandoned mobility scooter
Forgotten shopping bag with product from store in distant plaza
Microscopic grit coats mouth
Unmistakable taste of blood, like a loose tooth or bit tongue
Dry air dehydrates throats
Thin cold air like on mountain top
Random PC vomits bright orange vomit with coupon
Someone handing out free samples from a fast-food store
Sticky gum trod underfoot
Periodic drips of unknown liquid
Wet carpet that squelches underfoot
Slippery soapy wet tiles with a wet floor sign
Obnoxious kids spitting and tossing garbage into plaza below from an upper balcony
Unbidden, psychic propaganda from one of the factions creates alien thoughts in a random PC
Faint smell of sirens from outside the mall
Sound of melting plastic like icicles running up your arm
Dangerous taste of gasoline on your tongue
The strange and unrememberable light that is in dreams suffuses everything
The sight of ordered tiles fills you with a vague aggression
Eyes fog up like glasses then gradually return to normal
